title: SKT rises above KOO Tigers 3-1 to become the 2015 World Champion
body: For the second time in three years, SKTelecom T1 has achieved the pinnacle of competitive League of Legends, taking home the Summoner's Cup as the 2015 World Champions. SKT went 15-1 throughout Worlds, and the team's decisive victory over fellow Korean powerhouse, the KOO Tigers, came after four games in the Finals' Best of 5 series.

I'm fairly certain SKT was not attached to the "perfect victory" and decided to play very loose each game against KOO.  Each game they fed harder and harder until they lost, then they were like "Okay now we'll just win."

thats how i felt, every game they kept going further behind to see how far they can get till they can no longer turn the game around. It was almost as though they were mocking everyone. We're so good that you guys have no chance so here lets feed you a bit and see if you can beat us then. No? ok so this game we'll feed you even more, Better? still no, ok lets just turret dive you level one, give you some kills then get aced in another fight and then lose some lane pressure and turrets for the global gold. can you win yet? Yes ok i see so this is our limit. time to finish this quick, just to show you we were just playing with you ( no pun intended) LOL

Halloween is a yearly celebration observed in a number of countries **on 31 October**, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows' Day.

Some of us have already lost faith in this years harrowing... The harvest of pain, fear, sorrows and most importantly souls is already over and we are preparing ourselves for the showdowns that await us prior to the return of the plump overlord who laughs at us maniacally as we frantically toil between life and death only then to sneak into our houses and steal our cookies and what ever beverages might be leftover from the day before lest he leave certain dairy based drinks to be spoiled by mornings arrival not to mention feeding god knows what to demonic steeds that pull him and an ever shrinking cargo of hit and miss a russian roulette of joy and disappointment... Yes I'm talking about you Sandy Claws!

~From a simple englishman 5 minutes prior to the 1st November~

I'm actually pretty disappointed with how Riot has handled the zombie and slayer skins. Like, I understand that Finals is a huge deal to many and there's been a lot invested into it. But there are still the people (including myself) that are mainly here just to play the game. I really look forward to these seasonal events/skins, but now that Halloween's over and the skins still aren't out, it has kind of killed the vibe for me. I hope they don't do this again in the future {{champion:32}}

cmon all let's admit it you saw this coming. SKT gonna dominate world anyway. But still congrat for KOO Tiger for ruining their perfect score. Well played all.

I just don't understand why KOO didn't run Lee Sin/Tresh/Ashe again in game 4. Those champs really set up the plays that gave KOO that win, b/c you had ashe for jg vision so Tresh & Lee could get other stat boosting items & KEEP making picks. Really baffling. I was pulling for an upset. GG SKT, but KOO got my support.
